The latest PDF version of this book is available for download.

You can get it directly from [this GitHub link](httpss://github.com/coentjo/agile-ai-in-pharo/blob/master/coens-ai-notes/_output/Coen-s-AI-Notes-and-Links.pdf).

::: columns

:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
